activities.title: Conestoga Computing Society | President & Founder
activities.description: Founded a 300-member CS community, hosting 10+ events/workshops to enhance skills and foster campus-wide collaboration.

activities.title: ConHacks - Hackathon | President & Co-Founder
activities.description: Initiated, planned, and executed a 130-participant hackathon, managing logistics, marketing, and operations to drive innovation.

activities.title: Peer-Assisted Learning Leader & Tutor
activities.description: Led tutoring sessions on C Programming for 25+ students in DSA, OOP, and core CS topics, improving overall grades by 45%.

activities.title: Atal Tinkering Lab | Student Lead
activities.description: Collaborated with 150+ students on IoT and ML projects, winning 4 awards at national and international science & tech expos.

items.text: Atal Tinkering Labs: Innovator of the Year - 2019
Guest Speaker: Google DSC, Queens University
